name: sort_unique_desc
description: Sorts a list in descending order and removes duplicates

name: sort_unique_asc
description: Sorts a list in ascending order and removes duplicates

description: Filters a list to keep only even numbers

name: mergeObjects
description: Merges two objects, with values from obj2 overriding obj1
usage:
const result = mergeObjects({a: 1, b: 2}, {b: 3, c: 4});
// Returns: {a: 1, b: 3, c: 4}

name: filterArray
description: Filters an array based on a condition function
usage:
const result = filterArray([1, 2, 3, 4, 5], x => x > 2);
// Returns: [3, 4, 5]

name: mapArray
description: Transforms each element in an array using a function
usage:
const result = mapArray([1, 2, 3], x => x * 2);
// Returns: [2, 4, 6]

name: capitalizeString
description: Capitalizes the first letter of a string
usage:
const result = capitalizeString('hello world');
// Returns: 'Hello world'

name: trimString
description: Removes whitespace from both ends of a string
usage:
const result = trimString('  hello world  ');
// Returns: 'hello world'

name: group_by
description: Groups items in a list by a key function
usage:
result = group_by([1, 2, 3, 4, 5], lambda x: x % 2)
# Returns: {0: [2, 4], 1: [1, 3, 5]}

name: title_case
description: Converts a string to title case (each word capitalized)

name: strip_whitespace
description: Removes leading and trailing whitespace from a string
usage:
result = strip_whitespace('  hello world  ')
# Returns: 'hello world'
